title: James Chartrand: How Adopting a Male Pen Name Earned Me More Business, Respect, & Money
itunes:author: John Bonini
itunes:summary: James Chartrand, the masterful copywriter behind Men With Pens, talks about her career arc and how adopting a male pen name has made all the difference in earning business, respect, and more money.
